body: Because gpu_input, target and module all come from cpu(with method to_gpu()). To get a halftensor gpu setting, we need a halftensor cpu and then convert it back. Alternatively this can be worked around by casting gpu_input, target and module directly to cuda.halfTensor but that requires more code since input can be tuple/list/Variable etc.
